title: Top Cancer Treatment and Research Center | City of Hope
author: Sep 8
description: City of Hope offers world-class cancer care and unparalleled patient outcomes. Compassion and discovery are at the heart of our approach. Contact us today.
cleaned_text: [ Newnan, GA Cancer Center ](/locations/atlanta) Personalized Cancer Care City of Hope is a one-of-a-kind, 100-plus-year-old, National Cancer Institute (NCI)-designated comprehensive cancer center. We're world-renowned pioneers in cancer research, treatment and prevention, bringing breakthroughs from the laboratory to our patients, with lifesaving speed. We're revolutionizing the delivery of personalized care - treating cancer with leading-edge technologies, innovative treatments and supportive care tailored to each patient's needs. And we're treating patients at locations across the United States through our national footprint of cancer centers. Learn more about our cancer centers by exploring the links below. Nationally Recognized Our National Cancer Center near Los Angeles is a National Cancer Institute (NCI)-Designated Comprehensive Cancer Center. Our National Cancer Center near Los Angeles has repeatedly ranked among the nation's "Best Hospitals" in cancer by U.S. News & World Report.
